擡字的基本解释

擡
tái
同“抬”。

擡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tái］
［《廣韻》徒哀切，平咍，定。］
“抬1”的古字。亦作“抬1”。
(1)举；往上托。
(2)指提高物价。
(3)指提高身价。
(4)两人以上合力扛举。
(5)抬扛。谓争辩，顶牛。
(6)挂。
(7)量词。两人合力抬物，一杠称一抬。

擡字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擡； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页459第26
【唐韻】徒哀切【集韻】【韻會】堂來切，?音臺。【博雅】擡揌，動也。　又【廣韻】擡，舉也。

擡字的起名意思

暂无。

lift
Basic explanation of words
lift
tái
Same as "lift".
lift
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tái］
["Guangyun" is only mournful, flat and fixed. ]
The ancient word "lift 1". Also called "lift 1".
(1) Lift; lift up.
(2) Refers to raising prices.
(3) Refers to the increase in value.
(4) Two or more people lift together.
(5) Lift and carry. That is to argue, top bull.
(6) Hang up.
(7) Quantifiers. The two lifted the object together, weighing with each bar.
lift
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　lift; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 459 26
[Tang Yun] I’m sorry to cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Come to cut, on the sound platform. [Bo Ya] Lifting, moving.　[Guang Yun] Lift up again, lift up.
